span.a: Update from Govenor Little - Stay -Home Order

div.p: The Grab & Go meals provided by Kimberly School District at Kimberly and Stricker Elementary Schools are considered an essential service. KSD will continue to provide this service, Monday through Friday, from 11:00 AM to 12:00 PM during the Governor's 21 day stay home order.
141 Center Street West | Kimberly, ID 83341 | (208) 423-4170 x 3308 | District Fax: (208) 423-6155
Transportation x 3328 | Maintenance x 3300 | Food Service x 3341 | Driving Directions
